website_summaries.verdict: The JBL Charge is a nice compromise for those who want a better-sounding portable wireless speaker but don't want to make the jump -- both in terms of size and price -- to something like the Jawbone Big Jambox or Bose SoundLink.
pros: The JBL Charge is a compact portable Bluetooth speaker that sounds very good for its size and is designed to be used horizontally or vertically
It also has a built-in USB port that allows you to use the speaker's built-in 6,000mAh lithium ion battery to charge other portable devices
And it ships with a neoprene carrying case
cons: can't handle heavy bass at higher volumes without distorting

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for Iphone/Ipad
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchase this speaker. I can hear my Ipad/Iphone all over the house placing speaker in the middle of my ranch style house. I can hear music now while in the shower, as Iphone speaker wasn't loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst speaker I have ever bought. When you can hear the sound, aside from the sporadic obnoxious beeps, it does sound good. Just have to ignore, and I really mean it, horrible blaring beeps-even fresh off the charger. Stick with something else, this is just frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Beca C

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding Bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of equipment! I highly recommend it. I purchased two for myself and 2 more for friends!
customer_reviews.author: jan erickson

customer_reviews.title: it sounds the best..
customer_reviews.text: ya know, it sounds the best...but there are issues with is that I just don't get....I think it turns itself off, at very random times....it seems to have issues with a USB connection...so I more often use the audio cable option, but it does sound good, nice bass to it
customer_reviews.author: Jason Degraf

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bluetooth portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: JBL has always been my speaker brand of choice. They have outstanding sound at a much lower price than Bose. This particular speaker works wonderfully with my iPhone and iPad with bluetooth and greatly boosts the volume of the music far beyond that of the iPhone internal speakers.. We use it when traveling to play "sleep music" when staying in hotels. It has a remote that allows you to change the volume or the song from across the room. The batteries last 8 hours before needing to recharged. For folks who like to travel with their digital music this is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Mantracker

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding small bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a small but powerful speaker with quality sound. It synced instantly via Bluetooth with my iPhone, and the carrying case is convenient. I bought it to provide some warmup music for my son's soccer team, and it delivered. It's not stadium-loud by any means, but when jacked up all the way, it has enough power to be heard clearly in about a fifty yard radius. (It got drowned out when there were other games going on, but before our 8 a.m. game, it was perfect.) Right now, it's streaming Christmas music perfectly from Pandora, standing discretely behind my monitor. I love living in the future. For the price, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: the_smoking_quill

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully with better luck.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 3 jbl speakers, 2 charge, 1 flip 3. 1 stopped working in just under a year and was replaced by the manufacturer. The 2nd charge I received stopped holding a charge after a little over a year and when I opened it to see about replacing the battery, there was black adhesive all over the circuit board. When I contacted JBL, all they could say was that it was out of warranty. The flip 3 was still under warranty, so I am about to have my 4th. Hopefully with better luck.
customer_reviews.author: shannonigans

customer_reviews.title: A good speaker for the price tag
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is a great product for the price tag. Ours lasted two years, which is pretty good because my husband is rough on equipment. The sound is good and the bluetooth has a good range. My husband mostly uses his phone to stream music through. Ours lasted two years before it just stopped holding a charge. We replaced with with a different JBL speaker. As I said, for the cost, it is a really nice speaker.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Persistance pays off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these before I got one that worked. The first two were totally inoperative on arrival. On my third attempt I was fortunate price wise but settled for the icky green one because at the time it was less than $100. The price on these fluctuates up and down along with color choices. I'm well pleased with the sound. Bass is better than I expected. I purchased it because I heard one that a friend has versus one of the high end Bose jobs. There is a definite difference but not enough to warrant the huge price difference. At $100 or less I'd recommend the JBL Charge to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: burke

customer_reviews.title: Small and powerful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never heard of this device until not too long ago. My friend has one and when she turned up the volume...I WAS FLOORED! Mine just arrived today and I am already enjoying my wireless speaker. Packaging-small box taped and unit was bubble wrapped. The speaker box is well made and also came with a clear plastic over the box. Color-As pictured Sound-AMAZING Volume-A+ Clarity-A+ Pouch-Basic-B Bluetooth-PAIRED WITH MY IPOD IN A MATTER OF SECONDS Compared to the beats-I am glad that I read reviews and watched some vids on YT. I have great sound and portability for 100.00 less!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lady

customer_reviews.title: Confusing in black
customer_reviews.text: When choosing the black shadow, you will receive the black unit with silver accents. The JBL charge "stealth" is pictured in the description along with the "black shadow", making it confusing as to which one you will get. After my order, I called customer service to confirm which "black" I was going to getting and was told I would actually receive the "stealth", which I didn't. Hence the two stars for the confusion and misinformation. Unit itself is a solid 4/5 stars. It will remain as long as they have the differing pictures up. Discount worked out for my trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for over a yr. now and it really never worked as it was supposed to. The sound is average but the problem i experienced was charging my cell phone from it and the Bluetooth function. It would be hard to pair and i would need to keep re pairing to my samsung s5 phone. It would also sometimes not charge my phone. I regret not returning this speaker. Obviously I had a defected speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J. Minerva

customer_reviews.title: Extreme portability + awesome battery life = lots of use!
customer_reviews.text: Although it is only about the same size as a 16oz beer can, this little guy can really crank out loud & clear music. Before buying this I had the much more expensive Sony BTX-500 which sounded nice, but was quite a bit bulkier, and after comparing the two I don't really hear much of a difference in sound so the portability of the JBL makes it the clear winner in my book. The JBL also has a great battery that will run all day - this makes a huge difference if you bring this to the beach, tailgating, golfing, or any other "full day" activity where you want to be able to listen to music the entire day.
customer_reviews.author: JimboJonesNJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product - use it quite often when traveling
customer_reviews.text: Good product. No regrets and use it quite often when traveling. Pros: + Decent sound for its size + Good battery life + Soft-sided case is nice for protecting it on the go + Unit can be charged with a standard micro-USB cable (next model down is a proprietary connector) + Battery allows for charging of other devices via a 5V USB jack if in a pinch. Cons: - Why no support for bluetooth speakerphone? The next model down supports it. - Audio not "top of class" for it's price/size

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best speaker for the money, mids and highs are great at high volume with a little bit of bass, not going to get much bass out of anything this small, use it in the golf cart while playing. Have to remember to turn it down sometimes when other golfers are around. This one was getting about 2 years old, so I ordered the Charge 2, but it does not get as loud as the original Charge so I returned it and just use this one. Battery last at least 3 round of golf before needing to recharge
customer_reviews.author: SWahl

customer_reviews.title: Music - Anywhere you want it, anytime you want it. Superb.
customer_reviews.text: Not an expert on speakers, so I don't have specs or comparisons to others. This is portable, convenient, and gives off great sound. Amazing deal for the price. Recommend this for everyone! I take it every where and it syncs up with my phone and other devices so I can have music everywhere I go: room to room in the house, picnics, parks, fireworks displays, camping, trips involving hotel stays, beach (be careful around water and sand, obviously), and any other number of activities you have. If you want music any where, any time, this is the device for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It Goes On and On
customer_reviews.text: I've been mildly interested in bringing my music along on my bike rides without it being in my ears. The Charge accomplishes that and much more in a smart compact design. It fits easily into my water bottle cage and I can usually hear it unless I'm going extremely fast. Bass isn't bad at all either, ditto for battery life. I can use it for hours and completely recharge my phone and still have life left over. There can be some distortion when turned up high, but some tweaking of settings usually fixes that. Only question is can it be daisy-chained with another?
customer_reviews.author: M. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker has an amazing BIG sound. It is JBL after all, but it still amazes me at the incredible sound from such small drivers. I have not been able to get it to pair with either of my laptop computers, but it will pair with my wife's Samsung S4. I have to use a cord to play it from my computers (one is an old XP machine with a USB Bluetooth dongle, and the other is a new Dell with Windows 8.1) I also can't speak to battery life, but my son-in-law has one and he reports up to 4 hours at nearly full volume. I'm thinking of buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. I don't like the way it powers off automatically though. Annoying. Everytime my laptop plays a vid I need to turn it back on. Everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best presents I've bought my husband in a while. He loves it and uses it all the time. We have a few speakers in the house, some wireless too. He thought he'd need a bigger unit to use outside by the pool but this one is amazing. We have used it for many parties and the sound is great, inside or outside. I gave it to him for Father's Day and after 6 months he still loves it and uses it. It is quick to recharge and the battery life is long. You can use it while it's charging too. Great all around.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING sound (lacking battery life)
customer_reviews.text: This has FANTASTIC sound. Throw away your JAMBOX and get one of these. I was on a mass bike ride and someone had one of these portable speakers in their backpack's drink holder and it was playing so loudly and clearly I thought it was a system much bigger and more expensive. This is a wonderful deal. I am using mine right now (had it for 2 years)! The only issue is the battery life is not as good as promised but it's a great at home speaker without taking up much room.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weal

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. I love the deep sound. (My sister has another brand, which doesnt have any bass). My boyfriend loved this too and got the next generation. I like the smaller size of this one. I use it outside when i work in the garden a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few weeks and keeps disconnecting and reconnecting from my phone that stays 3 feet away from it all day...ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: LLA

customer_reviews.title: 4 years and still sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I have had this JBL Charge since 2013 and it's still working really well, it sounds great and is very portable. The battery charge has lost some of it's might but it's probably still at 90%. The sound is the reason I bought it when I returned a beats pill that sounded way to tinny. We shall see how much life is left in it, but it was a great purchase of 4 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Cedeno

customer_reviews.title: This is a great speaker. I debated between this and a very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker. I debated between this and a very cheap $49 one. I'm glad I opted for this. The sound fills a large living room with loud music if I want it to. It fills our outdoor pool area with music without skipping a beat. The music quality is surprisingly good for such a small device. We take it with us on trips and just love it. The battery lasts and lasts. My wife used it to connect her Note 3 to extend her battery and make calls on her last trip and was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Eljin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is incredible!! Couldn't be happier with it, after a month of use!
customer_reviews.author: Al B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound for small speaker
customer_reviews.text: I'm an "old" guy and lived with the Boom boxes for outdoor sounds the past 35 yrs. I was real surprised at the sound of this small unit. I tested out about 3-4 different units at the local Best Buy and decided to try this one. I took it to the beach and it played for 9 hrs before it ran out of gas, but it sounded great. All of my friends couldn't believe that much sound could come out of such a small unit. I have a solar back up battery to make it last for an additional 4-5 hours. I can recommend this unit. No more lugging around that 50 lb. boombox anymore.
customer_reviews.author: F. Takashima

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product in this price range.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of online research that suggested this would be a good buy for around $115. WRONG. I bought this to replace a JLab Crasher which cost about half as much but produced much higher quality sound. The JBL does produce higher volume than the Crasher did and has a nice fit and finish, but sound distorts noticeably at even moderate volume and is very "tinny" with little bass. I'd suggest paying less money for the same (or sometimes better) sound or spending more and getting something you'll be happy with.
customer_reviews.author: saiyan_trainer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Although it was a little expensive, it is worth the money. Volume can be turned up loud enough that you can't have a conversation standing next to the speaker, while the music is not distorted by the high volume. The battery will not last for 12 hours unless you are listening at low volume. High volume (enough for our campsite) lasted about 8 hours. Full recharge takes about 4 hours. Bluetooth pairing is very easy, although I prefer to use the 3.5mm plug to save the battery on my phone. I have not used the usb charging function yet. The case that comes along with it is pretty nice. Great speaker with clear sound and enough volume to ROCK.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Review to the point
customer_reviews.text: The Charge is awesome. With so many products to choose from I became lost in all the details. All I wanted was a speaker system I could take out by the pool and jam out. I wanted it to be loud enough to hear my music outside and have it be decently loud. The Charge does just that. Perfect size for throwing in bag to take anywhere. Sound is great through all volume levels. Super easy to connect to bluetooth. When at the pool I do not even have to play at full volume. I am very happy with this purchase. Last, it comes with a pretty cool case.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: That was a smart move by JBL
customer_reviews.text: I drive an older government car with no port to plug in my ipod or bluetooth. I heard this speaker while out working one day and was impressed. Rich sound, crisp, has decent enough bass. I now bluetooth my phone to it and stream musice all day long. Should have bought this years ago. Battery lasts every bit of 10 plus hours. USB port is a plus if you need to charge your phone from the unit. That was a smart move by JBL. And the neoprim carrying case is perfect. Bose charges $45 for their case. Perfect for travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Ride Hard

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing EVERY day. I put it in my bathroom while I get ready in the am. I put it on the kitchen counter when I cook. On my deck when I enjoy a nice afternoon. Its gone to hotel rooms for music. I have several biking friends that use them and they all love it as well. It's got high quality sound for the price. It's quite impressive really. For the cost, it's a great value. I don't see how anyone can be disappointed with this. Simply great. If mine broke today, I'd have a new one tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rothmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has amazing bass and sound for it's size. It can easily fill a 20 x 20 room, although it will distort slightly at higher levels. Obviously it is lacking when playing music with heavy base, but far less so than most of it's competition. The battery power is excellent as well. My only complaint is the huge power brick you use to charge it. You would think they could have scaled that down a bit. However it can recharge through USB, so it's a very minor issue. Good versatile speaker, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: DeKalb Land Man

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this Bluetooth speaker. Good sound quality, it will play pretty loud for outdoor use if listening from a distance. Battery life is fantastic, when listening at reasonable volumes it lasts in excess of 10 hours from my experiences. The no fuss pairing worked flawlessly with my Samsung Galaxy S5. I'd recommend this JBL speaker to anyone who needs an easy to use, small portable speaker with cordless capabilities. 4 stars because I feel it is a little to pricey for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Carter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I had no idea what to buy when my daughters said they wanted blutooth speakers. I read every review posted by the customers and decided to take a chance with two of these. They Are Great! It took the girls 30 seconds to sync them and get them to start working. The sound is really good and does not distort when they turn them very high. These may not be the best fit for those who like professional quality but they were better than expected for my young adults. Great value for the price! Thank you to all of those who take the time to write reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have about this is the volume on my phone will not control the volume on the JBL. Looks like numerous other customers have been running into this as well. I previously had bought the JBL Flip which did not have this problem, but I got the Charge for the longer battery life. The battery life is fantastic and the sound quality is great for the price! Just note that it sounds much louder indoors than outdoors, but it can still get pretty loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good overall sound, need better bass response
customer_reviews.text: I like most of the sound of this little speaker. It goes loud enough but misses the mark regarding the bass. Even using equalization. But didn't have high expectations because of its size. It will suffice for my needs being portable and wireless. The Bluetooth connectivity with my iPhone 6 was flawless. I didn't want to spend a lot of money and this speaker fit the bill. For the highly critical listening individual, like I used to be, go bigger and spend a little more money. For the casual listener, I recommend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: DaveyG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is awesome. I have had the same one for over a year (bought this one for someone else) so I know without a doubt this is a great product. I put it in my water bottle holder on my bicycle. It has been through some sprinkles and mist, it came out of the holder when I hit a bump at 25 mph and still works perfectly. The sound is great. When I ride with my husband I am usually behind him and he can hear it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Fleischhauer

customer_reviews.title: The best bluetooth hands down,bar none.
customer_reviews.text: Wow.The sound that comes out of the Charge is amazing.Even blew my girlfriend away and she went to best buy a got the green one within an hour of playing with my charge.Id give it another 2 stars if I could..its that great and the black shadow casing is awesome and feels great,rubbery but firm,nice grip.Also it very easy to use and pair without even looking at the directions,very intuitive.The price is right for it now days too.I would highly recommend this as the best portable Bluetooth speaker iv owned or showroomed at best buy.
customer_reviews.author: rawdogpj

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker compared to others ive tried or purchased including ...
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker compared to others ive tried or purchased including the Oontz angle.Please, not even close!! I realize there is a big price difference,but as a consumer I will pay more for superior quality.I have to turn the volume down, rather than max volume on other speakers.So I took the time to write this review since this speaker exceeded my expectations. Hope this is helpful to anyone looking to get that small,loud inexpensive speaker!! Bluetooth connection is a breeze as well!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Parker

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: This can be your own portable personal stereo system with great looks and form factor. The sound is great for such a small speaker. Once you have it and get the feel for how to enjoy it, you can easily carry it around with you while you work in the garage, go out to wash and wax your car, cook in the kitchen, etc. It goes everywhere and you start to see how placing it in different locations can produce a great sounding single speaker system. Well worth the price and I definately rate this as a must buy if you love listening to music. This speaker is fun! PS I love Amazon!!!! Best place to buy whatever you need.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with JBL
customer_reviews.text: I'm convinced that one cannot go wrong buying a JBL product. I currently own a JBL PA system and JBL Studio Monitors, and I expected the same great sound quality from a bluetooth speaker bearing their name. I was not disappointed! Since this purchase I've given two as gifts, and received many compliments regarding the sound. Everyone is looking for a much bigger appliance and are surprised when they learn that all that noise is coming from that little tube... Great stuff, and another great JBL product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. I love the fact you can charge your iPhone/iPod/Android device from it. The only negative is that the bass isn't so...bass-E. Its better than most and I like this a lot more than my Jambox. Overall the sound quality is good. Don't let my negative about the bass get you down. Lets face it. No device of this size is going to have killer bass. The Bose soundwave 3 is probably the way to go if you have an extra $100 to spend but for the money I might pick up another one of these since my sister in law keeps barrowing ours.
customer_reviews.author: Dads Rule

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, this is my second one and the first one has lasted for more than 2 years. I have dropped it many times and have used it for 6 or more hours a day for 5 days out of the week. This original jbl speaker is better than the second one and the plus because it is just louder and not muffled by the bass. These do not need bass in my opinion, just loud clear music as this original charge provides. If your gonna get one, get this one!
customer_reviews.author: 70rjtgk

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - very useful
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds great, has plenty of volume, and the battery charge lasts a long time. It has many uses. Although it has been great for listening to music in a variety of circumstances, my favorite experience was at a big conference where I was a session chairman. One of the presenters had a video with audio that he wanted to present. I linked my JBLCharge to the conference computer and it filled the small auditorium with sound. I was certainly glad that I brought it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Neece

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bluetooth speaker that looks good.
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly heavy and looks good in a formal environment; however, the sound disappoints. Doesn't get very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of use!
customer_reviews.text: I've given this device more use than most other electronics I buy. Everything from music while driving to in the tub taking a bath (not in the tub with me obviously). Has great battery life and good volume for my purposes. Once or twice I tried to use it as a spare battery to give a little extra juice to iPad but unsurprisingly it killed the battery VERY fast. Have not tried it with something like a phone but it's still good to possibly have around in an emergency. I gave mine to my mom so she can use it when she gives massages but fully intent to buy another for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Robert McKaye

customer_reviews.title: Great little Bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the kitchen to sync up with our smartphones or iPad to plan Pandora, iHeart Radio, etc. so we can listen to tunes while dining or cooking. Works just fine and sound quality is good for it's size. I find that you can get a little more bass if you place it up against a wall or a corner somewhere. Set up was very easy - no glitches. Haven't had the need to use the built in charger feature but can see where it can come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Love my Jbl Charge
customer_reviews.text: i have a jbl flip and decided to get this one because of the added bass and much longer battery life. i really like that it charges with a micro usb just like my droid phone. it comes with a 2milli amp charger that i now use to charge my phone as well. the sound is very clear, the bass is impressive for its size.it goes fairly loud. i really like that it has a high quality lithium ion battery. the dk shadow version has a black rubberized texture on outside that i like how it feels.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Best Speaker for Golf
customer_reviews.text: This is the best speaker for golf. It perfectly fits in a cupholder (nice design!). This allows you to point the speaker in any direction without hassle. The battery lasts for almost 3 rounds of golf (btwn 12-15 hrs). It is loud enough without distortion to be heard on the green or tee box when your cart is on the path greenside. It gives a muted ring if you are paired with your phone, so you know when you get a call and you do not disturb golfers with a loud ring. You cannot go wrong with this thing. I have seen and heard them all on the course. Every other speaker pales in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: YellowBelliedCuckcoo

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Very nice to have to be able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very nice to have to be able to move room to room. It's got a pretty good range of distance, and the sound is pretty incredible for such a small speaker. My only wish is that you could keep two sources connected to it, instead, you have to reconnect a second phone when you want to use it instead of the first one. Not hard, just an inconvenience. So nice for the wireless speaker...take it in the next room to clean, or out in the garage to work.
customer_reviews.author: JoBuck

customer_reviews.title: Works great / Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: It is NOT a full blow sound system in a tube. But for its size and cost it sounds pretty decent. Battery life is good, and it does charge devices like my phone pretty well. The neoprene case kinda sucks. It is rather tight, and you have to remove the unit from the case to do anything. I would have been nice to have some cut outs or clear plastic windows in order to operate the buttons while the unit is still in the case. Other than that I have no complaints. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: ANG

customer_reviews.title: Rich, sweet, bold vibrance with true fidelity
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit dubious hearing some top reviews by other professionals until I tried the JBL Charge for myself. WOW, this speaker sounds terrific - very surprising how such a moderately sized portable speaker can provide such a powerful, clean sound that's pleasing to the ear. As a testimonial, I bought another speaker as a Christmas present that was very well received. If you can afford this beauty, don't miss out on the opportunity to enjoy quality vibes - your ears will love you for it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Nistler

customer_reviews.title: Does not work in the long run.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an anniversary gift for my husband. At first it was great. The sound and portability were terrific. But, not even 3 months into ownership, and we cannot get it to connect to bluetooth, it does not hold a charge, and overall just does not work, Of course this is long enough after purchase that it is no longer returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kaczynski

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of bluetooth speakers before buying this one. It really does sound good for it's size and the fact that you can also use it to charge your phone from it's built in USB port is just another plus. Don't expect large speaker sound like a home stereo. When it comes to bass it's all about size and these do a great job for how small they are but it's not going to compare to a 10" or larger home speaker in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, good product
customer_reviews.text: Probably has 75% of the sound quality of a friends bluetooth Bose, but way easier to carry around and use. My USB cord didn't work upon arrival, but the JBL customer service was great and resolved that right away, although I could not use the unit for a week while I waited for resolution. But otherwise absolutely no issues, and it seems reasonably tough. Range seems very good, I can leave my phone in the kitchen and get reception anywhere in the house yard or garage.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and portable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound in a small, solid speaker. Simple design. I'm very happy with this purchase. Update 1/22/17: I had to lower the rating for this speaker. It has stopped connecting via Bluetooth...none of my devices can discover it. It has not ever been dropped or damaged...in fact, it has sat on a dresser since I got it. I am disappointed that a speaker in the price range I paid has simply stopped functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie G

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend. Broke after 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has great battery life and excellent sound, but the charging port broke after only occasional use for 3 years. The company is not standing by their product, so I do not recommend this speaker. A $100 speaker should last longer than 3 years. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great product...
customer_reviews.text: Really powerful and compact for a wireless audio system... Connects very easy with other devices... It has a neat and cool design, easy to use for anyone, great sound for indoors and outdoors... Arrived within the days indicated... The only objection to my device is that I got the White one instead of the Black that I ordered... even when I paid more for the Black one... The box says Black but the device is White...
customer_reviews.author: Ines

customer_reviews.title: Quality music everywhere you go:)
customer_reviews.text: My first review on amazon and i am a long time costumer. just can't miss this one. Basically every time i buy things, i do a huge research and that is what i ended up with. just everything was pointing in JBL charge direction.Never had a portable speaker before ,but i am totally happy with this one. Not too big, not too small. Sound quality is great! Saw BOSE just came up with their equivalent of this kind of speakers, but i would say even if was available when i purchased this one , i will still choose the JBL. Hope i was helpful and happy listening:)
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandar S.

customer_reviews.title: I loved it for the 18 hours I owned it
customer_reviews.text: I loved it for the 18 hours I owned it. Got stolen before it's first charge was under 50% full. Bummer. (UPDATE) Got a new one. I had the Jambox before (small version). The sound of the JBL is far superior. Battery life (so far) is comparable. I really like the buttons. Far easier than the Jambox to use. I use it in my truck quite a bit (the vehicle's sound system is poor) so easy operation is a must. I know a handful of others who have different varieties and everyone is convinced the JBL is the loudest and most powerful.
customer_reviews.author: HDT

customer_reviews.title: Very nice BT speakers
customer_reviews.text: I like these speakers quite a bit. The BT behavior is very easy to use and reliable and the battery life is astonishing. The sound is good though a tiny bit flat in the mid-range. But given the small size and reasonable weight this is not surprising. I'm very satisfied with this purchase and these are my main travel speakers now. Go with BT. Being able to still use my phone rather than having it stuck on a fixed station is a huge improvement over pre-BT units.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner Stallion

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a while.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker worked pretty good for a while. It charges well. Sounds pretty decent. However after about 6 mos. it just stopped pairing with my Iphone 6. Everything I've tried and it won't reconnect. My wife has the same phone and it connects to hers like a champ. My phone will connect fine to my wife's Jawbone Big Jambox. We've since switched speakers because of this, but I liked the size of this one better. I could take it with me mountain biking in my Camlebak which is the whole reason I bought this one. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Cazy J

customer_reviews.title: Little with large sound.
customer_reviews.text: We got this speaker to use outside by our pool. I was very hesitant at first because this thing is tiny & I wasn't sure if it would be loud even for the whole backyard. But let me tell you- it gets loud!! And the audio stays very clear. Pairing via Bluetooth was super easy & although the Bluetooth range isn't huge it still works great. I actually love the fact that it's tiny because we can easily carry it around to different rooms of the house or even take it on walks with us. It was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: BLHoleman

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set up the Bluetooth with my husband's phone ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality sound out of a little package. It was easy to set up the Bluetooth with my husband's phone (and his phone is old, by cell phone standards). And I like that the sound resonates out and sounds more full, unlike that smaller JBL circle unit (the Clip?), where the sound is linear (that probably didn't make any sense). You'll get what I mean if you try them out at your local store. It can play for about 6-10 hours before it needs to be charged, depending how continuous music play is.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is great and the sound quality does not diminish much as ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it almost always when seeing a movie or TV shown from my laptop when I was on my bed with my girl friend. The battery last really long time, usually I only charge the battery only once every week. The sound quality is great and the sound quality does not diminish much as long as I stay anywhere on the king size bed of mine. I brought it to the July 4 BBQ and firework event. People are impressed and very glad I had brought it to light up the scene.
customer_reviews.author: iDOBBi

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, and no issues
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 5 months now. Great sound, and no issues. One thing I did notice, if you are tailgating and need something that really put it out ... this is not powerful enough. I'd suggest the bose in this case, as I tried both and the bose does put out more sound and will fill a party well. The JBL charge sound great indoors with a lot of people, but not powerful enough for an outdoor party.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality for its class, much preferred over the Jambox
customer_reviews.text: We have the standard size Jambox and this speaker in our family. We wanted portability and as decent sound as possible given the limited size requirements. We liked the styling of the Jambox but the sound quality was poor (muddy sound, distortion at limited volume levels). The JBL Charge is leaps and bounds better in terms of sound quality. No problems setting this up with my iMac and my iPhone 4S. Very happy with the unit and bought two more for the family.
customer_reviews.author: ctakim

customer_reviews.title: Was great for 7 months, then died.  Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: It worked great, sounded great, but 7 months after getting it, it died. It will not play, it's like the battery is not passing the current through to the speaker, it will not play when plugged in, or on battery only. The battery charge lights do light up, but no sound. Not happy. It's too late to return it via Amazon. Not Happy.
customer_reviews.author: John D Hillmer

customer_reviews.title: Better than (b) cant (beat) the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fills the room with sound. The battery lasts all day when used. Durable construction...my cat knocked it off of the counter onto a hardwood floor. No damage! Travel case would be perfect if it had a pocket for the charge cable and plug. For the price it kicks other brands out. People with the (b) were impressed and couldn't believe how much it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hermanson

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for the price range. Decent sound just don't crank the volume to the maximum. Has a power bank to charge your phone just in case and you can do it while listening. Decent size that you can put it on a bottle cage of your bike if you want. Only hing that is missing In my opinion is a 2.5 stereo output so that you will be able to use another jbl charge simultaneously. As you know you cannot use two blutooth device at the same time from one source.
customer_reviews.author: Swabe

customer_reviews.title: too small, sounds Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than i expected and while sound quality is good for a small speaker, it doesn't blow me away at all. Had to go back and research which one i've seen and liked at bestbuy, and it is a significantly bigger version that will blow you away. but costs around $160 for the higher wattage JBL version.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Real nice....
customer_reviews.text: I'm a musician and hi-fi kinda guy and thus unit does the trick for me and I'm very particular when it comes to sound. Great bass given it's size and power, and frequency response if balanced. I highly recommend this unit. Very easy to use and connect to via Blue tooth. Besides being so portable (for vacations, travel on business, etc.) I use it in my house so I don't have to power up my rather massive stereo. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: MeteoManMusic

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound, easy to use, half the price of similar products. I can charge my phone or ipod too! I just used it for the first time at a belly dance performance and it was so convenient to use, and the sound was marvelous. I bought one last month and then bought another because I read that they can be linked/synced/paired to play together. I think I need to get the JBL Charge app in order to do that though. All my friends want one now!
customer_reviews.author: Swampthang

customer_reviews.title: ... saying I also have the JBL Flip which sounds great! I purchased this because the battery life of ...
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I also have the JBL Flip which sounds great! I purchased this because the battery life of the JBL Flip was too short, and would not get me through a work day. The Black shadow does not sound as well as the flip: however, the extra battery life and battery life indicator makes up for it. The shadow sounds good but needs a little more treble or JBL needs to make an equalizer app. I give it two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Lathan

customer_reviews.title: As most other reviews say.  It sounds amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for mother to listen to music at the pool with her phone. She couldn't be more happy. My sister wanted one for her birthday too. Easy for me. I'll save you the comparisons and detail. For the size, it sounds awesome. It is a bit bigger than I thought. But not too big to carry around. Paired easily to all our phones. I don't think it is possible to find anything better (likely equivalent) for the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for a small speaker. Good battery life and easily charged. Much better quality speaker than any others in this size and price range. My daughter has only listened to those terrible phone speakers or that portable record player set, so she was amazed. Please listen to good stereo floor speakers, but if you can't, these are the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has a very good sound for its size. I use it mostly while camping, paired with a Sansa Clip Zip MP3 player. The battery life is at least 12 hours, which about matches the life of the player. I feel it works best standing vertically, since there is a speaker at the top. I have not used it for charging other devices.
customer_reviews.author: 2cent

customer_reviews.title: JBL Charge Fully Meets Our Needs
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Previously listened to a Bose SoundLink Mini. We are not audiophiles but that said it sounds as good or close to as good at a much lower price. Initially had a problem pairing the Bluetooth. Part of the problem was not fully reading directions, and part getting the hang of how long the activating button needs to be held down. There are no technical problems. Comes with a decent cover. All in all very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Zapples

customer_reviews.title: It's a good speaker. Not so big on the bass but ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good speaker. Not so big on the bass but I use it with my Kindle mainly for watching TV shows which works well. The battery does last about as long as advertised. However, when it runs down, you can plug it in for immediate use. It takes about 10-15 minutes of charging before you can use it again. Once you get to that threshold you can use it again while it charges.
customer_reviews.author: gnlmiami

customer_reviews.title: Total Ear Candy!
customer_reviews.text: This item is awesome. I could not wait to receive it to start playing it. Very simple plug and play set up and the sound quality is superb as can be expected from JBL. I love being able to play via Bluetooth or direct single audio cable connection. The sleek and modern design is another major plus and is a perfect complement to my other high tech devices. Perhaps down the road JBL will introduce a model that can operate the volume/on-off switch with remote control. I'll be on the lookout for it :-) Great job, JBL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for your help
customer_reviews.text: This speaker I get yesterday brand new or used, because it is don't have a box and manual for speaker. How can I know to use. Thank you. Bye
customer_reviews.author: TRAN LONG

customer_reviews.title: Small but packs a good punch
customer_reviews.text: I just got my JBL charge yesterday. It's a lot smaller that I though it would be. Bluetooth connection was painless and easy, sound pretty nice for it's size and feels solid and well built. Sounds pretty loud for such a small device. I like the feature that shut it off when no signal is in range to save battery life. All in all I'm pretty happy with it, maybe is a little pricey but if it lasts then it will money well spent. Rock on
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Annoying / Good Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I just got the JBL Charge not too long ago to hook up to my laptop/phone for music and for netflix. I have to say that I am extremely annoyed by the constantly blinking power light on this speaker. Every other second my room is bright blue. I hate it. No, I don't want to white trash it up with electrical tape to cover the light. Otherwise... the speakers are surprisingly good for their size.
customer_reviews.author: Rancheres

customer_reviews.title: JBL Charge
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing! We were looking for something small for the bathroom, but something that packed some punch. This was definitely it! I'm somewhat of an audiophile. I looked into all the reviews on it before I bought it, which were great! They actually have it at Bestbuy, so you can hear it before you decide. Sounded way better than the Beats Pill! It's also great on trips. In the hotel or wherever. Watched a couple of movies on my tablet and used this for surround sound. Can't say enough about it, great buy & worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performer at a Decent Price!
customer_reviews.text: The JBL Charge is a good buy. I played it alongside the most expensive SONOS Play 5 and the JBL performed comparably as long as I didn't raise the volume all the way up. At full volume, the sound quality suffers; however, you do not need to crank the JBL all the way up to enjoy clear sounds. Why only four stars? Only something that is perfect will get five stars from me and, so far, nothing out there is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LAC

customer_reviews.title: Great product for its class......expect the Micro USB port to die and not take charge after a few years of regular use...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this didn't get 5 stars is that the micro USB port s*** the bed after 3 years of regular use...pretty much useless after that unless you are a low voltage tech nerd who knows where to source parts and solder electrical connections. Great sound for its size in class for what its worth
customer_reviews.author: markysmoove

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase Depending on the Seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a product I lost. Love that this is portable and easy to pair. I would reccomend buying this product new. Unfortunately the one I purchased used from Loot Hive has a lot of static in the audio and a few visible cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great speker
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect when I first got it. I absolutely love it and would buy another one if I had another gift card :) I use it for bike parties and biking in general and it's LOUD! The only thing I do not like, which is sometimes a pain, is that the range on the bluetooth is not great. Sometimes, I carry it on my cup colder (on my bike) and want to have someone else connect to it while biking, but the range becomes a problem even when the other person is maybe 10 yards away. Other than that, it's perfect! Long battery also.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Really?
customer_reviews.text: I'm suprised by the positive reviews. The charge 2 is very good. The charge 1 is very poor. Although they have similar battery life and stats the sound quality is completely different. I think some of these reviews might mistakingly be for the charge 2? For anyone contemplating this purchase it's the charge 2 not the charge 1 you should buy. I think there is only a $20.00 difference or less.
customer_reviews.author: abu

customer_reviews.title: Want another one.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and it charges with the same power plug I use for my Android smartphone (Galaxy S4). Can be placed vertically or horizontally. It even has a USB charger you can use in case your music source needs a charge. When I'm at the golf course it fits perfectly in the cup holder of the golf cart. I may ask Santa for another one this year so I can have one handy in the car to compliment the one I keep at the office. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Saints Fan and Father of 4

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: The JBL Charge has really nice sound for it's size. I use it in the bathroom, the kitchen and the backyard. It is plenty loud for these locations. It does not have thumping bass, but it does sound good. Connects to my S3 flawlessly every time I use it. I don't know if the bluetooth connection offers the full 30 foot range that is advertised. Tends to cut out if your phone does not have a clear line to the speaker. Great battery life. Will shut down by itself if not used for a while, so it doesn't suck the life out of the battery when not being used. Overall I like it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: austin wills

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit. First one I gave to a friend who was amazed by the performance while on the beach. She was happy when I gave her the speaker. This has amazing sound and will charge a phone or tablet at least three times on one charge. Can be used with either a cable or in the bluetooth mode. Can't go wrong with this speaker, so get it if you want a portable speaker for sharing your music with others.
customer_reviews.author: Pete X

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Love this JBL Charge blue tooth speaker. Great sound,nice base, 12 hr battery life, USB charger built in, neoprene carrying case...ready to go when you are. Con: The directions are the worst I've ever seen.....mostly pictures. No real directions on synching or re-pairing the speaker with devices. I had look check online forums to find that information. Bottom Line: Great speaker, horrible follow thru on directions.
customer_reviews.author: C. White

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy the JBL speaker do to all the great reviews. I have to agree this is a fantastic speaker, sounds awesome and battery life is really good. I can go days using it for hours a day and not have to charge it. Linking by blue tooth is easy. The neoprene cover does block some sound but I will take it rather than get sand from the beach in the speakers. Well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: If you're expecting to tear the house down or drown out a large gathering of people with loud bass or music, then buy a Boom Box..... However if you're looking for some loud music that can be easily heard by several people even while talking with a decent amount of bass then by far I highly recommend, are their units louder and or with more bass of course.... For the price overall feel and sound, very few can match
customer_reviews.author: Flex

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks! !! I use it skiing all winter!
customer_reviews.text: I ski every weekend during winter and this rocks. Jam out in lift lines all day. . Charge my phone at the bar recharge and rock out at home after. . A lot of bass for the size and incredibly durable. .. so many crashes and it rocks on! Love it! Edit 6/14/2020: I purchased a JBL charge, not this alphasonik thing this is now affiliated with.
customer_reviews.author: ChallengerRT

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely awesome. I use it on the tennis courts while ...
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely awesome. I use it on the tennis courts while practicing. It can be charged via Solar Charger and you can boost your iphone too. The sound is so much better than the Pill. If this had speaker phone option... 5 Star! Overall, a great buy, geat portability, great functionability, and great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas, and he uses it all the time! It's a great portable stereo and provides great sound. He's synced it to his phone and we've used it while doing housework, while outside, or just hanging out (since the TV's sound system doesn't sync to phones or laptops). It's very loud for its size and also has a great range. Don't expect window-shaking bass but it's quite respectable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: We bought this speaker for my daughter for Christmas, and I think I was as excited to try it out as she was. It did not disappoint. I thought it had an excellent sound for a speaker that size. The bass was reasonably deep and the highs sounded crisp. The pairing process took only a few seconds. I liked it enough that I went on Amazon today and bought two more, one for me and one for my wife. It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Texas23
